meta_description.title: Sega Rally Championship - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Sega Rally Championship is a 1994 racing video game developed by Sega AM3 and published by Sega. ... meta_description.title: Sega Rally - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Sega Rally is a series of racing video games published by Sega and developed by several studios including Sega AM3, Sega and Sega Racing Studio.

knowledge_panel.description: sega rally championship is a 1994 racing video game developed by sega am3 and published by sega. originally released for arcades using the sega model 2 board, it was ported over to the sega saturn in 1995 and windows in 1997. wikipedia
